title: @Meddler was curious about Taric (you are probably sick of hearing abut him)
body:
I was reading a few things you commented on hinting about rough time frames on a few champion reworks. For example Poppy and GP hopefully making it out this season. Is there any indication as to where either season wise or month wise we can get and EXTREMELY rough timeframe on Taric's rework. Sorry to ask again I am just a big Taric fan and would love to seem him in his outrageous glory up to snuff visually and gameplay wise with the other supports.
 
Thanks in advance for any information you can share.

replies.body: I'm not sure on Taric sorry. His timeline's much more defined by figuring out his visual and thematic details than gameplay. Figuring out how to perserve the key bits of his personality and tone, while upgrading his visual quality, is one of the key things that'll define when his update comes out. Improving his kit by contrast's simpler. Ironstylus has talked about the art side of things a bit previously e.g. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/gEKAkdFJ-ironstylus-hows-taric-going and will be able to offer more details than I can.
Alright, very much appreciated! Should I make a new post or comment on the boards post you linked to touch base with them?

I suspect you'd have more luck with a fresh post, given posts 2 months old on Boards don't get viewed much. That's a guess though, can't speak for certain about how/when Ironstylus and the other art folks forum surf.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G6ygpBYX,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-30T23:20:51.659+0000)
>
> I suspect you'd have more luck with a fresh post, given posts 2 months old on Boards don't get viewed much. That's a guess though, can't speak for certain about how/when Ironstylus and the other art folks forum surf.

Alright thanks again Meddler.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G6ygpBYX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-30T18:51:45.301+0000)
>
> I'm not sure on Taric sorry. His timeline's much more defined by figuring out his visual and thematic details than gameplay. Figuring out how to perserve the key bits of his personality and tone, while upgrading his visual quality, is one of the key things that'll define when his update comes out. Improving his kit by contrast's simpler. Ironstylus has talked about the art side of things a bit previously e.g. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/gEKAkdFJ-ironstylus-hows-taric-going and will be able to offer more details than I can.

It's easy, just let this guy to make the VU;
His kit is so good already, what could they possibly do to change it for the better I wonder.

His kit is good yes but he doesn't even remotely bring as much active utility to the table as much as other supports can and everyone can do what he does better. I think the one unique move he has is his ult. All of the passive utility on his moves are nice but it's clear they aren't enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Bakryu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G6ygpBYX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-30T17:26:30.910+0000)
>
> His kit is good yes but he doesn't even remotely bring as much active utility to the table as much as other supports can and everyone can do what he does better. I think the one unique move he has is his ult. All of the passive utility on his moves are nice but it's clear they aren't enough.

Taric is a champion that is picked against certain team comps.  He is very good at what he does.

I believe he has the 4th highest win rate for Support champions right now in Plat.

I have a 65% win rate with him so he's doing pretty good right now :)

What kind of team comps are you referring to?  Because his peel is lacking pretty hard, I guess his damage compensates well for it and the fact Dazzle is a targeted skill is pretty good. I'm just curious.
Ha!... they show here.. of alll the threads on here that make so much more sense.

I don't see how it's fair that because you didn't get a redposter on your thread that you come to mine and ask them to go look at your Quinn post and then post a passive aggressive comment because Meddler commented on this. I asked a simple question and he answered me. You however are proposing reworks for a character minor ones they may be but IF a member of the community posts something they deem useful they reserve the right to use it without notifying you. It's in the Riot terms of use that anything you post here is that is a concept they can use. Not to mention the fact that threads that SUGGEST things to Riot at least for champions and reworks for them don't get much in the way of comments from Riot. However in my experience questions asked that are relative and not frighteningly specific they will answer to the best of their ability. I asked Meddler about a week ago if Morde would eventually get an update to bring him up to date artistically he answered it. You can't deal in specifics because in this sort of game things can change in an instant. I have seen Riot post on A LOT of threads about Quinn and fixing her bugs. He may not be able to comment on whether a rework for Quinn is coming or not because their is a lot that has to be done to even decide if a champion is worth reworking or just tweaking.

> [{quoted}](name=Bakryu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G6ygpBYX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-03-30T20:43:00.731+0000)
>
> I don't see how it's fair that because you didn't get a redposter on your thread that you come to mine and ask them to go look at your Quinn post and then post a passive aggressive comment because Meddler commented on this. I asked a simple question and he answered me. You however are proposing reworks for a character minor ones they may be but IF a member of the community posts something they deem useful they reserve the right to use it without notifying you. It's in the Riot terms of use that anything you post here is that is a concept they can use. Not to mention the fact that threads that SUGGEST things to Riot at least for champions and reworks for them don't get much in the way of comments from Riot. However in my experience questions asked that are relative and not frighteningly specific they will answer to the best of their ability. I asked Meddler about a week ago if Morde would eventually get an update to bring him up to date artistically he answered it. You can't deal in specifics because in this sort of game things can change in an instant. I have seen Riot post on A LOT of threads about Quinn and fixing her bugs. He may not be able to comment on whether a rework for Quinn is coming or not because their is a lot that has to be done to even decide if a champion is worth reworking or just tweaking.

Sorry if you felt disrespected by me posting here regarding Quinn, that was not my intent & I sincerely apologize.

However, I didn't mean anything passive aggressively toward Meddler... I haven't the slightest how you mean. If you're thinking I assumed he's purposefully ignoring her/me, that's not at all what I meant. I just meant, 'hey maybe you haven't responded to it b/c you don't have an opinion on her or it's not your territory'--and that's it.

Also, if all you wanted was merely a simple, single question & answer... why are you in a fuss about me coming in here & being a little off-topic? Your work was done & that's the impression I got (you even just proved it by saying so)... so I didn't think it'd be a big deal since you got what you were looking for. However again, either way, I'm sorry.

> [{quoted}](name=Eyrgos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G6ygpBYX,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2015-03-30T23:57:11.385+0000)
>

Your work was done & that's the impression I got (you even just proved it by saying so)... so I didn't think it'd be a big deal since you got what you were looking for. However again, either way, I'm sorry.

I would actually like to apologize I mistook you for another commenter due to similar icons and lack of much time to type things. I would say Quinn definitely needs some TLC she is my favorite ADC at the moment and while I do manage to win lane it is at the expense of trying my ass off whereas Graves has a much easier time than I. Again I'm sorry for mistaking you for another person. You're comment was innocent enough and I was wrong to jump on you for it.

how about basic questions.. and not my threads but others who have put in much time and effort, they went in in the same fashion. and yea.. it was a more pressing issue to be honest and yes... it is worth noting. sorry it had to be your thread but... its true
Why does he have to be support? Hes better in the jungle anyway

Hey Meddler, sorry to hijack a little, but I'm interested on if you've seen my Quinn thread addressed to you? Idk if you have no opinions or it's not your realm to chat about her... but I'd love if we could speak a little bit in there!

Regarding Taric, I like that you have in mind to preserve key aspects of what makes him 'whole,' so to speak.
